legal_basis: paragraph 490 of the Federal Courts Rules
evidence_assessment: Independent appraisals confirmed the offer exceeded fair market value
No evidence suggested further advertisement would yield better offers
decision_reasoning: The plaintiff provided evidence showing FPI’s offer maximized proceeds for creditors
Defendants’ arguments were speculative and unsupported
conclusion_outcome: The court approved the sale to FPI as fair and just
result_of_case: The sale to FPI was approved, with terms set by the court's order
